fixes.name: Gross Profit %
fixes.dax_expression: SUM('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Gross Profit Total]) / ABS(SUM('Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]))
fixes.solution_explanation: Mapped Tableau aggregations to DAX: SUM -> SUM, ABS -> ABS. Transformed field references to table-qualified format: [Gross Profit Total] -> 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Gross Profit Total], [Profit] -> 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit]. This calculation uses aggregations, so it is implemented as a measure.
